pullrequest.title: Change cmake project name to sdformat8, export cmake targets

content.raw:
Ah, good catch!

I believe the problem is

    set(sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE PROJECT_PKGCONFIG_REQUIRES)

should instead be

    set(sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE PKGCONFIG_REQUIRES)

Notice that `PROJECT_` was removed. This was changed when support for component libraries was added to `ign-cmake`.
content.html:
Ah, good catch!

I believe the problem is

set(sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE PROJECT_PKGCONFIG_REQUIRES)

should instead be

set(sdformat8_PKGCONFIG_TYPE PKGCONFIG_REQUIRES)

Notice that PROJECT_ was removed. This was changed when support for component libraries was added to ign-cmake.
